description:
In this course “Learn PHP Online - PHP Video Tutorials for Web Development,” we explore the PHP foundation for developing dynamic web pages, websites, and content in general.

This course will walk you through the basic understanding of PHP and then we apply what we have learned in order to make a dynamic web page.

This course is a MUST HAVE if you are looking to build a full blown dynamic website. 

We sponsor a companion book title "PHP 5 and MySQL 6" by Larry Ulman.  We do not have any affiliation with Larry or Peach Pit Press.  However, we do enjoy their line of books and the majority of topics discussed can be found within this book.

You may purchase it here (Help support the TDC):

Take this course now to see ultimate PHP Video Tutorials and learn PHP for Web Development.

</p>
title: The Basics of PHP for Web Development
